state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to attempt to head north. After that, travel east. Next, venture south. And then, travel south. Once you manage that, move east. That done, travel north. Then, attempt to move north. With that done, go east. Then, attempt to go to the east. With that done, make an effort to venture north. After that, make an attempt to move north. And then, attempt to head west. After that, go south. And then, pick-up the dvd from the floor of the bedchamber. And once you've done that, you win! -= Bedroom =- You are in a bedroom. Look over there! a recliner. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a recliner? The recliner is typical. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
